Description: International and domestic civil (passenger and freight) and military aviation.

Transportation from public and private road-going automobiles, inluding cars and light duty trucks. NOTE: public fleets of cars (e.g., postal delivery vehicles or light-duty utility service vehicles) should be included here
Private heavy vehicles, including heavy duty trucks (including semis) and private busses
Road-based public transport, including busses, tolleys, and streetcars
Passenger and Freight rail transport, including heavy freight, heavy passenger, and light passenger rail
Emissions from fuels used by domestic water-borne trips and international water-borne trips (incl. the sea, inland water channels, and lakes)
